text: @NYGovCuomo Death rate just keeps faaaaaaaalling, exactly like your and the #fakenews narrative.. if it wasn't for all the elderly who died under your watch and because of your EO the death rate would be even lower.. #COVID19 #DemocratsAreDestroyingAmerica #Trump2020LandslideVictory
